# `getUserById(userId)`

### Parameters
- `userId`

  - type: `string`


### Returns
- `Promise<User | undefined>`. To know about the `User` object click [here](https://github.com/supertokens/core-driver-interface/wiki#third-party-user)

### Throws 
- [GENERAL_ERROR](./../errors/general_error)
